testSteps.description: User is searching for a contact and typing a message in the chat to send it

assertions.text: Send message button should be visible

evidence.description: Green send button clearly visible in bottom-right corner while composing 'Hello' message
Send button visible while typing 'Hello test message' - button remains consistently positioned
Send button still visible with completed message 'Hello test message!' ready to be sent
Message successfully sent and visible in chat list, confirming the send button was functional and visible throughout

assertions.explanation: Throughout the video sequence, the send message button is consistently visible in the chat interface. The button appears as a green circular icon with a send arrow/paper plane symbol, positioned in the bottom-right area of the message composition area. It's visible in multiple frames both when the keyboard is displayed (frames 4-11) and when the user returns to the chat list (frame 14 shows the message was successfully sent). The button's visibility is clear and consistent across the entire flow.
